sidebar.step_0.title: üìú Wamkelekile kwiSafetyHelp
sidebar.step_0.description: Phonononga izixhobo zethu ezibanzi kunye nezibonelelo zokuphucula ukhuseleko nezempilo emsebenzini wakho.
sidebar.step_0.fun_fact: ‚ö° Ngaba uyazi ukuba ukusebenzisa ababoneleli abanokuziphatha okuhle kunokunciphisa iingozi emsebenzini ngokuqinisekisa ukuba umsebenzi wenziwa ngexesha kwaye ngokomgangatho ophezulu wokhuseleko?
intro.title: Wamkelekile kwiSafetyHelp
intro.description: Phonononga izixhobo zethu ezibanzi kunye nezibonelelo zokuphucula ukhuseleko nezempilo emsebenzini wakho.
welcome.title: Wamkelekile kwiSafetyHelp
welcome.description: Iqonga lakho elithembekileyo lokhuseleko nezempilo emsebenzini (OHS) eMzantsi Afrika. Sinikezela ngezixhobo ezizenzekelayo, eziphuculwe yi-AI ukuqinisekisa ukhuseleko nokuthobela izikolo, iicawe, kunye namacandelo angacwangciswanga. Joyina uluntu lwethu ukuze ufikelele kwizibonelelo, iinkonzo, kunye nenkxaso eyenzelwe iimfuno zakho.
why_choose.title: Kutheni Ukhetha iSafetyHelp ukuThobela i-OHS?
why_choose.content: ISafetyHelp liqabane lakho elithembekileyo lokuthobela ukhuseleko nezempilo emsebenzini eMzantsi Afrika. Iqonga lethu linikezela ngeesuti ezibanzi zezixhobo ezilungiselelwe ukuhlangabezana neemfuno ezizodwa zamashishini afana nokwakha, imigodi, kunye nokuvelisa. Ukusuka ekuveliseni iirejista ezisemthethweni ukuya ekuvavanyeni ingcipheko, iSafetyHelp yenza lula iimfuno ze-OHS ezintsonkothileyo ngeewizadi ezisebenziseka lula kunye nenkxaso yexesha lokwenyani nge-chatbot yethu ephefumlelwe yi-AI. Ixhaswa yimithetho yaseMzantsi Afrika kunye neendlela ezilungileyo, sinika amashishini amandla okudala iindawo zokusebenza ezikhuselekileyo ngelixa siqinisekisa ukuthobela i-OHSA kunye ne-COIDA. Joyina amawaka abasebenzi abachwephesha abathembele kwiSafetyHelp ukukhusela amaqela abo kunye nokwenza lula iinkqubo zokhuseleko.
legal_obligations.client.title: Iimbophelelo zoMthengi
legal_obligations.client.reg_5_1_a: UMmiselo wokuKwakha 5(1)(a): Lungiselela uVavanyo lweNgcipheko oluSisiseko (BRA) oluchonga iingozi zeprojekthi.
legal_obligations.client.reg_5_1_b: UMmiselo wokuKwakha 5(1)(b): Nikezela ngeNkqubo yokuKhuseleka neZempilo ecacisa iimfuno ezithile zeprojekthi.
legal_obligations.client.reg_5_1_l: UMmiselo wokuKwakha 5(1)(l): Yamkela uHlelo lweZokhuseleko neZempilo lweKontraka ngaphambi kokuba umsebenzi uqale.
legal_obligations.contractor.title: Iimbophelelo zeKontraka
legal_obligations.contractor.reg_7_1_a: UMmiselo wokuKwakha 7(1)(a): Ngenisa uHlelo lweZokhuseleko neZempilo olusekwe kwinkcazo yomthengi.
legal_obligations.contractor.reg_7_1_b: UMmiselo wokuKwakha 7(1)(b): Gcina iFayile yeZokhuseleko neZempilo esizeni enazo zonke iingxelo ezifunekayo.
legal_obligations.contractor.reg_9: UMmiselo wokuKwakha 9: Qhuba uVavanyo lweNgcipheko kunye noVavanyo lokuChonga iNgcipheko (HIRAs) ezithile kumsebenzi.
legal_obligations.professional.title: Iimbophelelo zoMsebenzi weZokhuseleko neZempilo
legal_obligations.professional.reg_5_5: UMmiselo wokuKwakha 5(5): Ii-Arhente (PrCHSA) zilawula ukhuseleko nezempilo egameni lomthengi, ziqinisekisa ukuthobela.
legal_obligations.professional.reg_8_5: UMmiselo wokuKwakha 8(5): Amagosa (CHSO) ancedisa abakontraka ekuphumezeni nasekuhloleni iinkqubo ze-OHS.
legal_obligations.professional.sacpcmp: Imihlahlandlela ye-SACPCMP: Kufuneka igcine ubhaliso kunye neemfuno ze-CPD zobungcali.
wizard.step_0: Nceda khetha isenzo ukuze uqale inkqubo.

wizard.step_8.title: Inyathelo 8 kwezi-9: Idityaniswe uKwenzela
wizard.step_8.specify_error: Nceda chaza ukuba uxwebhu ludityaniswe ukwenzela bani.
wizard.step_9.title: Inyathelo 9 kwezi-9: Phonononga kwaye Yongeza kwiNgobo
wizard.step_9.description: Phonononga ukhetho lwakho kwaye yongeza amaxwebhu kwingobo yakho ukuze uqhubeke.
cart.title: Ingobo Yakho
cart.invoice_reference: Inombolo yeReferensi ye-Invoyisi: (Isebenza iintsuku ezi-7. Bhalisa ukuze igcinwe ngokungapheliyo!)
resources.title: Nxibelelana nabachwephesha abavunyiweyo be-OHS
resources.description: Udinga uncedo lwengcali? Nxibelelana nabachwephesha abavunyiweyo kwiimfuno zeprojekthi yakho.
resources.jane_doe: Jane Doe, i-Arhente ye-SACPCMP (PrCHSA) - Inombolo yoBhaliso: PR12345 - Unxibelelwano: jane.doe@example.com
resources.john_smith: John Smith, Igosa le-SACPCMP (CHSO) - Inombolo yoBhaliso: CHSO67890 - Unxibelelwano: john.smith@example.com
resources.emily_brown: Emily Brown, Ummeli we-OHS - Unxibelelwano: emily.brown@example.com
footer.newsletter.title: Hlala Uhlaziyiwe
chatbot.response: Ndilapha ukunceda! Ngeengcebiso ze-OHS ezenzelwe wena, nceda qhagamshelana nengcali.
construction.title: Ukhuseleko Lokwakha
construction.description: Qinisekisa ukuthobela imimiselo yokhuseleko nezempilo lokwakha usebenzisa izixhobo ze-OHS zeSafetyHelp. Izibonelelo zethu zikunceda ulawule iingozi, uthobele iimfuno zomthetho, kwaye ukhusele abasebenzi esizeni, utsala kwiindlela ezilungileyo ezichazwe kwi-'Safety First: The Essentials of OHS Plans.'
legal_appointments.title: Ukuqeshwa Okusemthethweni
legal_appointments.description: Lawula ukuqeshwa okusemthethweni kokhuseleko nezempilo emsebenzini njengoko kufunwa yimithetho ye-OHS yaseMzantsi Afrika. Sebenzisa i-organogram ukwabela iindima, ugcwalise iinkcukacha zomqeshi, kwaye uvelise uxwebhu olubanzi ngeeleta zokuqeshwa, iirekhodi zoqeqesho, kunye nokunye.
organogram.title: I-Organogram yokuQeshwa Okusemthethweni kwe-OHS
organogram.form.name: Igama loMntu oQeshiweyo
legislation.title: Umthetho
legislation.description: Fikelela kwilayibrari ebanzi yemithetho ye-OHS, imigangatho, kunye nohlaziyo. Velisa iirejista ze-OHS ezisemthethweni, khangela imithetho ethile, kwaye uphonononge ubudlelwane phakathi kwemithetho. Iingcaciso ezilula ziyafumaneka ukuze zithengwe ukwenza imibhalo yomthetho entsonkothileyo ifikeleleke ngakumbi.
legislation.tools.title: Izixhobo zoMthetho
legislation.updates.title: Uhlaziyo lweMithetho kunye neMithetho eYiliweyo
legislation.standards.title: Imigangatho ye-OHS
services.title: Iinkonzo zeSafetyHelp
services.description: Fumanisa uluhlu lweenkonzo zokhuseleko nezempilo emsebenzini ezilungiselelwe ukuxhasa iindawo zokusebenza, izikolo, iicawe, kunye namacandelo angacwangciswanga kulo lonke uMzantsi Afrika. Ukusuka ekuboniseni ukuya kuqeqesho, iSafetyHelp ibonelela ngezisombululo ezilungiselelwe ukuqinisekisa ukuthobela nokhuseleko.
services.consulting.title: UkuBonisana nge-OHS
services.consulting.description: Fumana iingcebiso zengcali malunga nokuthobela i-OHS, ulawulo lwengozi, kunye nokuqeshwa okusemthethweni kubachwephesha bethu abavunyiweyo. Sisebenze nemibutho efana ne-Anglo Platinum, ABSA, kunye ne-Metrorail ukuhambisa izisombululo ezilungiselelwe.
services.training.title: Iinkqubo zoQeqesho
services.training.description: Fikelela kwiinkqubo zoqeqesho ezibanzi zazo zonke iindidi zemizi-mveliso, kubandakanya ukwakha, ukuvelisa, kunye nemfundo. Khetha phakathi koqeqesho lokuqala, iikhosi ezithile kwindima, kunye nokunye, konke kuhambelana nemithetho ye-OHS yaseMzantsi Afrika.
services.audits.title: UkuHlolwa & Uphicotho
services.audits.description: Qinisekisa ukuba indawo yakho yokusebenza ifikelela kwimigangatho ye-OHS ngeenkonzo zethu zokuhlola nophicotho. Izixhobo zethu zikunceda uqhube ukujonga ngokucokisekileyo, uvelise iingxelo, kwaye uphumeze amanyathelo okulungisa.
services.risk_management.title: Izicwangciso zoLawulo lweNgcipheko
services.risk_management.description: Velisa izicwangciso zolawulo lwengozi (RMPs) ezilungiselelwe ezigubungela umthetho waseMzantsi Afrika, imithetho kamasipala, kunye nemigangatho yehlabathi efana ne-ISO 45001, ukuqinisekisa ukuba ishishini lakho lilungiselelwe nayiphi na ingozi.
services.support.title: Inkxaso & Izixhobo zoLuntu
services.support.description: Joyina uluntu lwethu ukuze uxele iizehlo, ufikelele kuluhlu lokutshekisha lokhuseleko lweevenkile ezincinci, izikolo, kunye neetavern, kwaye unxibelelane nabanye abachwephesha be-OHS ukuze ufumane inkxaso kunye nentsebenziswano.
training.title: uQeqesho Olubanzi lweNdawo yoMsebenzi
training.description: Phonononga iinkqubo zethu zoqeqesho ezibanzi zendawo yomsebenzi ukuqinisekisa ukuthobela imithetho ye-OHS yaseMzantsi Afrika kunye nokukhuthaza indawo yokusebenza ekhuselekileyo. Khetha uqeqesho olusezandleni, uqeqesho lweqela, okanye usebenzise iwizadi yethu ukuze ufumane iingcebiso ezilungiselelwe ngokusekelwe kwishishini lakho, abaphulaphuli ekujoliswe kubo, kunye nendawo.
training.wizard.start: Nceda khetha ukhetho ukuze uqale inkqubo yokucebisa ngoqeqesho.
training.wizard.step_1.title: Inyathelo 1 kwezi-5: Khetha iShishini Lakho
training.wizard.step_1.label: iShishini:
training.wizard.step_2.title: Inyathelo 2 kwezi-5: Khetha Abaphulaphuli Bakho ekujoliswe kubo
training.wizard.step_2.label: Abaphulaphuli ekujoliswe kubo (Khetha zonke ezisebenzayo):
training.wizard.step_2.error: Nceda khetha ubuncinane abaphulaphuli abakujoliswe kubo.
training.wizard.step_2.option_emergency_: Iqela leXesha likaxakeka (Abancedisi bokuQala, Abacimi boMlilo)
training.wizard.step_3.title: Inyathelo 3 kwezi-5: Chaza iNdawo Yakho
training.wizard.step_4.title: Inyathelo 4 kwezi-5: Iikhrayitheriya eZongeziweyo
training.wizard.step_5.title: Inyathelo 5 kwezi-5: Phonononga uQeqesho oluCetyiswayo
training.wizard.step_5.description: Ngokusekelwe kwizinto ozifakileyo, nazi iinkqubo zoqeqesho ezicetyiswayo. Khetha ezo ufuna ukuzongeza kwingobo yakho.
training.cart.title: Ingobo Yakho yoQeqesho
training.cart.customization.title: Lungiselela Izixhobo Zakho zoQeqesho
training.cart.customization.emergency_li: Nceda faka inombolo yonxibelelwano yexesha likaxakeka esebenzayo (umz., +27123456789).
training.cart.compiled_by.title: Idityaniswe Ngu
training.cart.training_type.title: Indlela yokuNikezelwa koQeqesho
training.cart.training_type.label: Khetha indlela yokuNikezelwa:
training.cart.checkout.disclaimer: Umxholo weSafetyHelp: Izixhobo zoqeqesho ezinikezelweyo zenzelwe iinjongo zolwazi kuphela kwaye aziboneleli ngeengcebiso zobungcali. Ngezisombululo ze-OHS ezilungiselelwe wena, qhagamshelana neSafetyHelp kwi support@safetyhelp.co.za okanye utyelele Iphepha loNxibelelwano.
training.checkout.success: Intlawulo iphumelele! Izixhobo zakho zoqeqesho zivelisiwe. Khuphela ii-PDF zakho ngezantsi. Ngoqeqesho lwe-intanethi, iikhowudi zokufikelela zithunyelwe kuwe nge-imeyile.
training.providers.title: AbaNikezeli boQeqesho abaVunyiweyo
training.providers.description: Udinga uqeqesho lobuqu? Qhagamshelana nababoneleli boqeqesho abavunyiweyo kwiimfuno zakho.
training.providers.provider_1: I-ABC Training Solutions - i-SETA Evunyiweyo - Igxile kuNcedo lokuQala, ukuCima uMlilo - Unxibelelwano: info@abctraining.co.za
training.providers.provider_2: iSafeSkills Academy - Ibhaliswe kwi-SACPCMP - Igxile kuKhuseleko Lokwakha - Unxibelelwano: training@safeskills.co.za
training.providers.provider_3: uQeqesho lweSafetyHelp - uQeqesho lwe-OHS Olubanzi - Unxibelelwano: support@safetyhelp.co.za
training.manual.purchase.title: Thenga iManuwali yoQeqesho eLungisekayo
training.manual.purchase.description: Fumana imanuwali yoqeqesho ebanzi elungiselelwe inkampani yakho, kubandakanya iimfuno zomthetho, umxholo othile wenkampani osekwe kwiprofayile yakho yengcipheko, kunye neekowuti ezivela kubaboneleli boqeqesho abavunyiweyo.
training.manual.risk_profile.title: Chaza iProfayile Yakho yeNgcipheko yoQeqesho lweManuwali
training.manual.risk_profile.label: iProfayile yeNgcipheko:
training.selection_method.title: Khetha indlela Yakho yoQeqesho
training.legal_fact.step_1: Inyaniso yoMthetho: iCandelo 8 le-OHS Act lifuna abaqeshi banikeze uqeqesho olulungiselelwe iingozi ezithile zendawo yomsebenzi.
training.fun_fact.step_2: Inyaniso eyonwabisayo: Ngaba uyazi ukuba uqeqesho oluqhelekileyo lunokunciphisa iizehlo zendawo yomsebenzi ukuya kuthi ga kwi-30%?
training.legal_fact.step_3: Inyaniso yoMthetho: Oomasipala bendawo banokuba nemithetho ye-OHS eyahlukileyo echaphazela iimfuno zoqeqesho.
training.fun_fact.step_4: Inyaniso eyonwabisayo: Iindawo zokusebenza ezinengcipheko ephezulu ezifana neziza zokwakha zifuna uqeqesho oluqhelekileyo ukuze kugcinwe imigangatho yokhuseleko.
training.legal_fact.step_5: Inyaniso yoMthetho: Umthetho we-OHS uyala uqeqesho oluthile kwiindima ezifana nabameli be-SHE ukuqinisekisa ukuthobela.

legislation.wizard.step_4.description: Phonononga izinto ozifakileyo kwaye uvelise i-RMP yakho. Ungayongeza umthetho ongezelelweyo ukuba uyafuneka.
legislation.wizard.step_4.additional_leg: Faka nawuphi na umthetho ongezelelweyo apha...
legislation.cart.title: Ukuphuma
legislation.cart.description: I-RMP yakho ivelisiwe! Sebenzisa ikhowudi yevawutsha FREERMP2025 ukuze ukhuphele simahla (abasebenzisi bokuqala abali-100).
suppliers.title: Uluhlu lwaBaboneleli be-OHS
suppliers.description: Fumana kwaye ulinganise ababoneleli be-OHS eMzantsi Afrika. Jonga ngokwendawo, iinkonzo, kunye nezivumelwano. Ngenisa uphononongo ukuze uncede abanye benze izigqibo ezinolwazi.
suppliers.list.title: Uluhlu lwaBaboneleli
suppliers.table.name: Igama loMboneleli
suppliers.review_form.title: Ngenisa uPhononongo
community_tools.title: Izixhobo zokuKhuseleka koLuntu
community_tools.description: Xela nasiphi na isehlo okanye ingozi yoluntu kwindawo yakho yoluntu okanye yokusebenza, ukusuka kwimingxuma ukuya kwizixhobo ezineziphene. Sebenzisa izixhobo zethu ukuqinisekisa ukhuseleko kwiisetingi ezifana neevenkile ezincinci, izikolo, izibhedlele, kunye neetavern.
community_tools.incident_report.title: Xela iSehlo okanye Ingcipheko
community_tools.incident_report.descript: Chaza isehlo okanye ingcipheko (umz., umngxuma kwiSitalato esiKhulu, isihlalo esaphukileyo kwiziko loluntu)...
community_tools.incident_report.user_soc: Isibambiso Sakho seMidiya yoLuntu (Ngokuzikhethela, umz., @username kwi-X):
community_tools.incident_report.provider: Faka ifowuni okanye i-imeyile (igcwalisa ngokuzenzekelayo ukuba umboneleli ukhethiwe)...
Isibambiso seMidiya yoLuntu soMboneleli weNkonzo (Ngokuzikhethela, umz., @CityofJoburgZA kwi-X):
Faka isibambiso se-X (sigcwalisa ngokuzenzekelayo ukuba umboneleli ukhethiwe)...
community_tools.list.title: Ezinye Izixhobo zokuKhuseleka koLuntu
community_tools.list.spaza_shop.title: Uluhlu lokuTshekisha lwe-OHS lweVenkele Encinci
community_tools.list.spaza_shop.descript: Qinisekisa ukuba ivenkile yakho encinci ifikelela kwimigangatho yokhuseleko lomlilo, umbane, kunye nesakhiwo ngokweemithetho kamasipala kunye noMthetho we-OHS.
community_tools.list.school.title: Isikhokelo sokuKhuseleka koMlilo seSikolo
community_tools.list.school.description: Funda iimfuno zomthetho zokhuseleko lomlilo ezikolweni, kubandakanya izicwangciso zokukhupha kunye nezixhobo.
community_tools.list.hospital.title: Isikhokelo sokuLungiselela iXesha likaxakeka seSibhedlele
community_tools.list.hospital.descriptio: Qinisekisa ukuba izibhedlele zilungiselelwe iimeko zikaxakeka ngezicwangciso zokukhupha ezifanelekileyo kunye nezixhobo zokhuseleko.
community_tools.list.tavern.title: Uluhlu lokuTshekisha lokuKhuseleka lweTavern
community_tools.list.tavern.description: Jonga ukuba iitavern zithobela imimiselo yokhuseleko lomlilo kunye nolawulo lwesihlwele ukuze kuthintelwe iizehlo.
dashboard.title: Ideshibhodi Yelungu
dashboard.welcome: Wamkelekile, [Igama loMsebenzisi]! Lawula ukuthobela kwakho kwe-OHS, ii-RMPs, uphononongo lwababoneleli, kunye neengxelo zoluntu apha.
dashboard.profile.title: iProfayile yeNkampani
dashboard.rmps.title: Ii-RMPs eziGciniweyo
dashboard.supplier_reviews.title: Uphononongo lwaBaboneleli
dashboard.incident_reports.title: Iingxelo zeSehlo
document_categories.title: Dibanisa amaXwebhu eNkqubo yakho yoLawulo lwe-OHS
document_categories.description: Khetha kwaye udibanise amaxwebhu owayifunayo kwinkqubo yakho yolawulo lwe-OHS. Khetha kwimigaqo-nkqubo, iinkqubo, imigangatho, kunye nokunye, okulungiselelwe iimfuno zombutho wakho.
document_categories.policies.title: Imigaqo-nkqubo
document_categories.policies.description: Iingxelo zokuzimisela kunye nokuzibophelela kwenqanaba eliphezulu, ezivunyiweyo ngabaphathi abaphezulu.
document_categories.policies.workplace_v: uMgaqo-nkqubo woBundlobongela kunye nokuNgqubana kwindawo yoMsebenzi
document_categories.policies.mental_heal: uMgaqo-nkqubo weMpilo yengqondo kunye nokuPhila kakuhle
document_categories.policies.infectious_: uMgaqo-nkqubo wokuPhendula kwizifo eziSulelayo okanye i-COVID-19
document_categories.policies.ohs_perform: uMgaqo-nkqubo wokuSebenza, uPhononongo, kunye neeNjongo ze-OHS
document_categories.policies.ohs_communi: uMgaqo-nkqubo woNxibelelwano, ukuThatha iNxaxheba, kunye nokuBonisana kwe-OHS
document_categories.policies.ohs_workpla: uMgaqo-nkqubo weMpilo kunye nokuPhila kakuhle kwindawo yoMsebenzi ye-OHS
document_categories.policies.ohs_documen: uMgaqo-nkqubo wokuLawula amaXwebhu kunye neeRekhodi ze-OHS
document_categories.procedures.title: Iinkqubo
document_categories.procedures.descripti: Izikhokelo zenyathelo ngenyathelo malunga nendlela yokwenza imisebenzi ngokukhuselekileyo nangokungaguqukiyo.
document_categories.procedures.hira_proc: Inkqubo yokuChonga iNgcipheko kunye noVavanyo lweNgcipheko (HIRA)
document_categories.procedures.first_aid: Inkqubo yoNcedo lokuQala kunye neXesha likaxakeka lezoNyango
document_categories.standards.title: Imigangatho/Izikhokelo
document_categories.standards.descriptio: Imigangatho yangaphakathi ehambelana nemithetho okanye imigangatho yeshishini, ichaza iimeko okanye indlela yokuziphatha elindelekileyo.
document_categories.standards.emergency_: uMgangatho wokuLungiselela kunye nokuPhendula kwiXesha likaxakeka
document_categories.standards.housekeepi: uMgangatho wokuGcinwa kweNdawo kunye noLawulo lweNkunkuma
document_categories.standards.hygiene_fa: uMgangatho weZiko lokuCocwa (izindlu zangasese, amanzi, iindawo zokuphumla)
